verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> which <S%H6437>looks<s%> <S%H6921>eastward:<s%> and <S%H6607>see,<s%> at the door of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5809>Azzur,<s%> and <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> these are the <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and who <S%H3289>give<s%> <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> in this <S%H5892>city;<s%>
who <S%H559>say,<s%> The time is not <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses:<s%> this is the <S%H5518>caldron,<s%> and we are the <S%H1320>meat.<s%>
Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against <S%H5012>them,<s%> prophesy, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>

The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on <S%H559>me,<s%> and he said to <S%H559>me,<s%> Speak, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> Thus you have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for I <S%H3045>know<s%> the things that <S%H4609>come<s%> into your <S%H7307>mind.<s%>
You have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H2491>slain<s%> in this <S%H5892>city,<s%> and you have <S%H4390>filled<s%> its <S%H2351>streets<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Your <S%H2491>slain<s%> whom you have <S%H7760>laid<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst,<s%> they are the <S%H1320>meat,<s%> and this is the <S%H5518>caldron;<s%> but you shall be brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>
You have <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> on <S%H5002>you,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

I will bring you forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of its <S%H8432>midst,<s%> and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers,<s%> and will <S%H6213>execute<s%> judgments among <S%H8201>you.<s%>
You shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
This shall not be your <S%H5518>caldron,<s%> neither shall you be the <S%H1320>meat<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst;<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> for you have not <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> neither have you <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> but have <S%H6213>done<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are around <S%H5439>you.<s%>

It <S%H5012>happened,<s%> when I prophesied, that <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%> Then fell I <S%H5307>down<s%> on my <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh!<s%> will you <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> even your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of your <S%H1353>relatives,<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> all of <S%H3427>them,<s%> to whom the inhabitants of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> Go <S%H7368>far<s%> away from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> This <S%H776>land<s%> has been <S%H5414>given<s%> to us for a <S%H4181>possession.<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> Whereas I have removed them far <S%H7368>off<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and whereas I have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them among the <S%H776>countries,<s%> yet will I be to them a <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for a <S%H4592>little<s%> while in the <S%H776>countries<s%> where they have <S%H935>come.<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and <S%H622>assemble<s%> you out of the <S%H776>countries<s%> where you have been <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
They shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5493>there,<s%> and they shall take away all the detestable <S%H8251>things<s%> of it and all its abominations from <S%H8441>there.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H5493>you;<s%> and I will take the <S%H68>stony<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> out of their <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh;<s%>

that they may <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5971>them:<s%> and they shall be my people, and I will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>

But as for them whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> after the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of their detestable <S%H8251>things<s%> and their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> on their own <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

Then the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were <S%H5980>beside<s%> <S%H3519>them;<s%> and the glory of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was over them <S%H4605>above.<s%>

The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> which is on the east <S%H6924>side<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> me in the <S%H4758>vision<s%> by the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> into <S%H3778>Chaldea,<s%> to them of the <S%H1473>captivity.<s%> So the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> went up from <S%H5927>me.<s%>
Then I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> all the <S%H1697>things<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had shown <S%H7200>me.<s%>
